title: Hi, I'm Bruno Oliveira.
presentation:
I have been working as a Full Stack Developer since 2021. I mainly work with Angular , Node.js , Firebase and Elasticsearch , developing scalable, well-structured web applications while applying good coding practices.

I have also had brief experience with React and .NET Core , expanding my technical foundation and understanding of different architectures and ecosystems. Currently, my focus is on further strengthening my technical skills by learning new technologies, with an emphasis on the Vue stack alongside Spring Boot , GraphQL and MongoDB.
fullstack_description: I participated in the development of several application, both web and mobile, using Angular, Ionic, Node.js, Firebase, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Elasticsearch, and RxJS.
trainee_description: I began my studies developing with Angular, Ionic, Firebase, and Bootstrap, aiming to  develop web and mobile applications to a Node.js backend.
technical_education_type_1: Technical Course in Internet Computing, integrated with high school
contact_description: Contact me or see more information about me.
github_description: Repositories, projects and contributions in development.
